text: "Countdown" was a song from Beyoncé fourth studio album 4. It went to number 71 in the United States, number 35 in the United Kingdom, number 45 in Ireland and number 62 in Canada. == Track listing == * Digital download # "Countdown" – 3:32 # "Countdown" (RedTop Radio Edit – Clean) – 3:57 * ;Digital download – Remixes EP # "Countdown" – 3:31 # "Countdown" (Reggae Rewind Remix) – 4:04 # "Countdown" (Olli Collins & Fred Portelli Remix) – 6:10 # "Countdown" (Jack Beats Remix) – 4:03 # "Countdown" (Single Version) [Music Video] – 3:32 == References == Category:2011 songs Category:Beyoncé songs
title: Countdown (Beyoncé song)
